lyrics.text:
’Oku lelei ‘etau le’o,
Pea vakavakai,
‘O tō ‘a e mahafutau,
Pea tali ‘aki.

Ke tau tali teke’i pē
Hotau fili lahi,
‘O tu’u alialiaki,
‘I he’etau tui.

Ko e tui kia Sīsū
Mo ‘ene pekia,
Ko e unga’anga ia,
Ki he Laumālie.

He ko e tui mo’oni,
Ko ‘etau pā ia
‘Oku tau me’atau ‘aki
Pea tau ikuna.

Ke tau tau, pea teke’i
Hotau fili lahi,
‘I he māhohi ‘o Sīsū,
‘Oku ‘Afio mai.
